## Methods

### getSelection

`getSelection() => Promise<KoliBriTableDataType[] | KoliBriTableDataType | null>`

Returns the selected rows.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<KoliBriTableDataType | KoliBriTableDataType[] | null>`
